timeline.message:
Catch a few numbers that shouldn't parse

Fix literals

timeline.bodyText: Note that this is a bug, that should be fixed on master. DECIMAL_LITERAL cannot match any token, because it's declared with a #.
timeline.author: oowekyala
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -62,7 +62,7 @@ protected TokenEntry processToken(Tokens tokenEntries, GenericToken currentToken
 
         if (ignoreLiterals && (javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.STRING_LITERAL
                 || javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.CHARACTER_LITERAL
-                || javaToken.kind == JavaTokenKinds.DECIMAL_LITERAL

replies.bodyText: I guess, we should also add TEXT_LITERAL to this list of ignored literals. We can fix both parts with #2159 .
replies.author: adangel
